There are many innovations in the field of science. According to the growing population the pollution is increasing and the growth of diseases has been increasing. it is the  scientists who are inventing and innovating  the remidies to cure various diseases that are occuring.

Technology on the other hand making life more easier. The ATM's which were launched has made a life easier by which every individual is getting instantly as a result of which the robberies were reduced. The e-Banking is enabling the individuals to purchase the Goods right from their house, make bill payments , book tickets for travelling purpose. 

 It is through this technology that we were able to find the fraudulants who are comitting the Crime.i.e,through DNA tests and mobile tracking.

It is the Education which is leading the world which helps in managing and making the work more easier since ancient times.finally, it is the Education which is ruling the world and with out it northing is impossible in the Modern Society.
